Flow.description: Screen Flow created to be executed when a record from "Interaction" object and "Quality Receipt Inspection" record type needs to be closed. It will check if all "Quality Receipt Inspection Items" are closed and with a status to update the interaction record with the final status.
Flow.label: Interaction - Close Quality Receipt Inspection

fields.name: Are_you_sure_you_want_to_close_this_inspection
fields.fieldText: Are you sure you want to close this inspection?
